body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Randy Hall and the customer's name is Theresa Powell.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting MetaCar. My name is Randy Hall, and I am here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Randy, I'm Theresa Powell. I'm feeling a bit anxious about my upcoming car rental.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Theresa. Let’s get everything sorted out for you. Could you please provide me with your booking confirmation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my booking confirmation number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Now, could you also provide me with the last four digits of your Social Security number for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, the last four digits are one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent! Thank you for confirming that information, Theresa. Is there anything specific that you are anxious about regarding the car rental?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm just worried that the car won't be ready when I arrive.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I assure you, your car will be ready and waiting for you when you arrive. We always strive to provide the best service possible.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Randy. That makes me feel a lot better.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Theresa! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out anytime. Thank you for your time today, and have a great day!
